item.title: Monopoly GO: Wild Stickers vs Swap Packs – What’s Better At The Start of an Album?
item.description:
As you start a new Monopoly GO sticker album, you’ll find yourself waiting for those Swap Packs and Wild Stickers, in hopes of speeding up your progress. However, when the album is brand new and every sticker feels precious, you’ll often find yourselves wondering which is more valuable—Wild Sticker or Swap Pack? This guide breaks down the pros of each of these to figure out which one is the best for you when you are starting your new sticker album in Monopoly GO .

Monopoly GO Wild Stickers vs Swap Packs

A Wild Sticker is a special, highly sought-after card that lets you choose any single sticker you are missing to complete a set. This includes even the rare gold stickers that cannot be traded, unless they’re featured in a Golden Blitz in Monopoly GO .

Whenever you receive a Wild Sticker, you will be presented with a list of all the stickers you don't currently have. You can simply select the one you want, and it will instantly be added to your album. Wild Stickers are incredibly useful for closing those stubborn sets that are just missing one specific card.

On the other hand, a Swap Pack is a type of sticker pack that contains multiple stickers, usually a mix of 3, 4, and 5-star cards. The unique feature of a Swap Pack is the ability to swap out some of the initially revealed stickers for new ones of a similar star value (within the 3 to 5 star range).

Swap Packs provide a greater chance of getting valuable higher-star stickers right away. The "swap" feature gives you more control over the outcome than a regular sticker pack. This increases your chances of finding stickers you need by letting you discard duplicates or less desirable ones.

At the start of a sticker album, when you're missing many stickers, a Swap Pack is better. These packs give you multiple stickers and the opportunity to redraw, increasing your chances of getting several new stickers in one go. With more stickers in the pack, you're more likely to fill in missing slots in different sticker sets simultaneously. The ability to redraw up to three times also increases your odds of getting something you actually need compared to a regular sticker pack.

However, a Wild Sticker is still incredibly valuable. If you do manage to get one early on, using it to grab any five-star Gold sticker can be a great strategy.

item.title: Roblox: Savannah Life Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Savannah Life is a well-made RPG with great graphics, mechanics, and a concept that you don't often find in other Roblox games. Here, you will have to survive as an animal, predator, or herbivore in a huge savannah filled with dangers and other players who can also pose a threat.

To dominate this world, you need to climb the evolutionary ladder from herbivore to predator as quickly as possible, but first you need a lot of currency, which is not easy to get. Luckily, you can redeem Savannah Life codes that will bring you a bunch of freebies, including currency that you can spend on the desired upgrades.

Updated May 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code is available, offering coins to boost your progress. You can also find other freebies that provide different amounts of coins. Make sure to redeem them while they're still active. Check back for future updates and more rewards.

All Savannah Life Codes

Working Savannah Life Codes

  • MONKEY - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins. (NEW)
  • THE_KING - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.
  • CROCODILE - Redeem this code to get 325 Coins.
  • I_BELIEVE_I_CAN_FLY - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.

Expired Savannah Life Codes

  • CLIMBING_CAT - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.
  • RHINO - Redeem this code to get 350 Coins.
  • LONG_NECK - Redeem this code to get 450 Coins.
  • CUTE_DOG - Redeem this code to get 275 Coins.
  • FREE_PRESENT - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • MOO_DENG - Redeem this code to get 400 Coins.
  • MUFASA - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.

As mentioned above, redeeming Savannah Life codes will bring you a bunch of useful things that will greatly help you progress in the game, especially if you are a beginner. It's worth noting that each of them has a certain expiration date, so if you don't want to miss out on rewards, redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Codes for Savannah Life

Redeeming Savannah Life codes will not be difficult for you, especially if you have done it before in other Roblox games. But if you're a beginner or don't understand how the Savannah Life redemption system works, here's a step-by-step guide to help you with that:

  • Launch Savannah Life .
  • In the main menu, you will see a list of buttons and options. Among them, interact with the last one which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field where you will need to enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, hit the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Savannah Life Codes

To find more Savannah Life codes, all you need to do is visit the game's official social media. Here, along with other content, developers often share Roblox codes, so be careful not to miss them.

  • Official Savannah Life Roblox group.
  • Official Savannah Life Discord server.
  • Official Savannah Life YouTube channel.

item.title: Flex UGC Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Flex UGC is a Roblox experience for buying UGC. You won't find game content here, as it's a marketplace where you can sell, trade, and buy items. Creators usually make packs of items and sell them. If you buy certain items, you can redeem codes and get more freebies. You can find Flex UGC codes in the list below.

Updated May 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Flex UGC has two new codes that give access to cool cosmetic items. You can grab the Easter Bunny Circle Pal or the Green Retro Roblox Hummer with the latest additions. There are plenty of other codes still active too, so you've got lots of items to explore. Keep an eye out for more updates soon.

How to Redeem Codes in Flex UGC

In many Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes. The same applies to Flex UGC . When you enter the experience, the option to redeem codes is literally the first thing you will see. Nevertheless, if you need a hint, you can use our guide below, in which we explain how to redeem codes in Flex UGC .

  • Open Roblox and launch Flex UGC .
  • After loading, you will immediately see a window. Click the Redeem a Code button.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

Remember that codes in Flex UGC can quickly expire, and it depends on many factors. Item creators may restrict access for some reason or simply run out of copies of the items. Therefore, redeem codes as soon as possible while you can.

How to get More Flex UGC Codes

There are many Roblox codes for Flex UGC and they are easy to find. They're posted on the board to the right of the spawn point, so you can look for them yourself. You can also use this guide too. We update it regularly so that you get the latest codes.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Project Orion Waiting Room Playlist
item.description:
Cyberpunk 2077 is, against all odds, a success, striking a chord with millions following its historically disastrous launch. Now that it’s been polished and expanded with myriad post-launch updates and the Phantom Liberty DLC, it’s safe to say that audiences are hopeful about the future of the franchise, eagerly awaiting the arrival of Project Orion , the code-named Cyberpunk 2077 sequel.

But for better or worse, it’s going to be a while before players get their hands on Project Orion . Understandably, CD Projekt Red was long preoccupied with Cyberpunk 2077 ’s patches and DLC, so full production on Project Orion has likely only begun in earnest relatively recently. In other words, Cyberpunk 2077 fans will need to fill the vast space ahead of them with other games, and luckily, there are plenty of great options to choose from.

What To Play While Waiting for Cyberpunk 2077’s Sequel

The Witcher 3

Perhaps the most essential game for Cyberpunk fans to play, The Witcher 3 is a strong contender for CD Projekt Red’s magnum opus. It has the same strong, mature writing and top-notch worldbuilding that players have come to expect following Cyberpunk , but its overall design, progression system, and narrative structure are surprisingly similar to its younger sci-fi sibling. Indeed, The Witcher 3 is akin to Cyberpunk 2077 in spirit, and a must-play title even for those who prefer sci-fi to fantasy.

Ghostrunner 1 and 2

Few games manage to capture the alluring, unsettling industrial cyberpunk landscape as effectively as Ghostrunner and its sequel, which are certainly similar to Cyberpunk 2077 in terms of aesthetic. Rather than setting players loose on a sprawling, seedy metropolis, the Ghostrunner games adopt a far more linear approach, focusing on a story of corruption and greed that is far more absurd and outlandish than Cyberpunk ’s in many ways. It may not be as intimate, relatable, or open-ended, but its fast-paced gameplay, killer soundtrack, and untouchable vibes make it a strong suitor for Cyberpunk 2077 fans.

Fallout 3, 4 or New Vegas

It’s not hard to find parallels between CD Projekt Red games and Bethesda’s RPGs. It wasn’t too long ago that The Witcher 3 was being viewed as a fledgling competitor to the then-mammoth Skyrim , after all, and Cyberpunk 2077 can be viewed as a different spin on the Fallout formula, at least in some ways. Fallout presents a very different sort of dystopia, to be sure, but its open-ended RPG systems, strong quest design, and flexible build variety make it a great alternative to Cyberpunk ’s dense, unique sci-fi hellscape.

Deus Ex: Human Revolution

On paper, Deus Ex: Human Revolution and Cyberpunk 2077 are strikingly similar. They both take place in a dystopic metropolis (although Deus Ex ’s setting is perhaps more authoritarian than Cyberpunk ’s anarchal plutocracy), both are first-person with a predetermined main character, and both contain quasi immersive sim elements. That last point is something that Cyberpunk 2077 doesn’t get enough credit for: CD Projekt Red’s flexible approach to mission and environment design, and the game’s surprisingly robust stealth mechanics, have a lot in common with deeper immersive sims. For those who appreciate such elements of Cyberpunk , Deus Ex is a great next step.

Robocop: Rogue City

Cyberpunk 2077 has more than a little Robocop DNA, so it’s fitting that 2023’s Robocop: Rogue City returns the favor, sharing certain traits with CDPR’s sci-fi RPG. It’s not open-world, and its RPG mechanics are even more watered down than Cyberpunk ’s, but its grungy science-fiction elements, 1980s aesthetic, and hard-hitting, power fantasy gameplay are nevertheless a treat for anyone looking for a Cyberpunk chaser.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Uncrafting Station Quest Guide (Cheshire Cat Level 7 Friendship Quest)
item.description:
The Uncrafting Station is one of the Cheshire Cat's many friendship quests in Disney Dreamlight Valley . Players will unlock a new feature by the end of the quest which will be extremely helpful to those who wish to get back some of the materials they wasted.

There aren't many prerequisites to triggering The Uncrafting Station quest, so it shouldn't be that hard to start. The quest itself, on the other hand, does ask Dreamers to collect various materials to test the Uncrafting Station in Disney Dreamlight Valley .

How To Trigger The Uncrafting Station Quest In DDV - Disney Dreamlight Valley

Make sure to level up the Cheshire Cat friendship to level seven to unlock The Crafting Station quest in Disney Dreamlight Valley . Next, speak with the mischievous cat as he has a surprise for players. But first, you must craft Three Wildly Jubilant Topiaries.

Material

Location

Clay x15

  • Glade of Trust
  • Sunlit Plateau
  • Forgotten Lands
  • Remove Bones Obstacles
  • Kristoff's Stall

Soil x15

  • Dig the Ground in All Biomes
  • Use Rich Soil at the Crafting Station to make normal Soil

Pink Houseleek x5

  • Sunlit Plateau

Once the Three Wildly Jubilant Topiaries are crafted, return to the Cheshire Cat, only to discover that you need to destroy them. Place them on the ground and use the Pickaxe to break the Three Wildly Jubilant Topiaries and gather the materials.

Next, the cat gives players three Balloon Arches and asks to destroy them as well. Same as before, place the items and use the Pickaxe to get the materials used to craft them. Now that players understand what the Cheshire Cat is trying to teach, they can start gathering materials to craft the Uncrafting Station.

How To Complete The Uncrafting Station Quest In DDV - Disney Dreamlight Valley

To complete The Uncrafting Station friendship quest in DDV , Dreamers must craft the Uncrafting Station and use it . The Cheshire Cat sends you to the Alice in Wonderland Realm to collect Blue Spores from the big mushrooms. Once you arrive inside the Realm, approach the first mushroom and grab the spores from beneath it. Follow the blue trail deeper inside the forest to grab all 20 Blue Spores.

Go back to Dreamlight Valley and collect the rest of the materials in DDV.

Material

Location

Mushroom x28

  • Glade of Trust
  • Remove Mushroom Obstacles

Glass x17

  • Combine Sand and Coal Ore
  • Kristoff's Stall

Purple Bell Flower x6

  • Forest of Valor

Blue Passion Lily x4

  • Frosted Heights

Hardwood x35

  • Forest of Valor
  • Glade of Trust
  • Sunlit Plateau
  • Frosted Heights
  • Kristoff's Stall
  • Remove Tree Stumps Obstacles

Blue Spores x20

  • Alice in Wonderland Realm

Place the Crafting Station anywhere in the valley and use it to uncraft any item. The amount of Dreamlight and time required to uncraft an item depend on the item itself . Simple furniture might take 150 Dreamlight and be ready in two minutes, while more complex furniture might ask for 5,000 Dreamlight and take up to two hours. Once the item you chose is ready, collect the refunded materials and speak with the Cheshire Cat to complete The Uncrafting Station quest in DDV .
